item.description:
Dear Members,

Next month's Boston Maltese Meet will occur on September 10th (NOT the 3rd, which is part of the Labor Day weekend!), from 2pm to 5 pm. Kate Horgan-Burke's Maltese training class will run from 1 pm to 2 pm. RSVP me about each event separately, please: (questions, write me at laptopmaltese@aol.com).

I am looking for a veterinarian to speak at this meeting at 3 pm. If you've already given me suggestions, I will be calling them. If you have new suggestions, please write me and send me the vet's phone number as well.

Anyone that wants to bring food, please let me know!(laptopmaltese@aol.com). Several people brought food last time, a wonderful addition to the event. Judy Ryan, Joan Labrie, Barbara and Joe Murphy, Fran and Rick Cashell. Lovely food and beautifully presented.

Thanks to all of you that brought food! If I forgot someone, many apologies and please let me know!

We again used the agility training equipment, but brought it out one piece at a time, so as not to crowd the dogs and owners.

Kate Horgan-Burke's training lesson will run from 1 pm-2pm. PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS MEANS THAT OUR REGULAR MALTESE MEET WILL START AT 2 PM, an hour later than we usually start.

Kate' training lesson was lots of fun. We worked on teaching our dogs boundaries in various ways. Suggestions for next time's lesson? Email them to me.

That's all for now!

Happy August.

Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Maltese September Meetup
